description:
At a village where only women live, a demon that was sealed away in a hanging scroll at Kanondo is revived. The demon merges with his main body, which had sunk to the bottom of the river, and shows his true form, a salamander demon.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A mais perigosa confissão de Miroku
La peligrosa confesión del monje Miroku
Miroku Houshi no Motto mo Kiken na Kokuhaku
弥勒法師のもっとも危険な告白
